Package org.dom4j.jaxb

Interface Summary
JAXBObjectHandler JAXBObjectHandler implementations can be registered with the JAXB Reader in order to receive unmarshalled XML fragments.
JAXBObjectModifier JAXBObjectHandler implementations can be registered with the JAXBModifier in order to change unmarshalled XML fragments.
 

Class Summary
JAXBModifier Reads an XML document using SAX and writes its content to the provided XMLWriter.
JAXBReader Reads an XML document and creates a DOM4J tree from SAX parsing events.
JAXBWriter Writes Elementobjects to an XML stream.
